tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE stock_prices (
    date DATE,
    symbol VARCHAR(10),
    open_price DECIMAL,
    high_price DECIMAL,
    low_price DECIMAL,
    close_price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE stocks ( 
    symbol VARCHAR(10) PRIMARY KEY, 
    date DATE, 
    open FLOAT, 
    close FLOAT, 
    volume INT 
);

CREATE TABLE stock_prices (
  symbol VARCHAR(10),
  date DATE,
  open_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  close_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  volume INT
);

CREATE TABLE stock_trends (
  trend_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  symbol VARCHAR(10),
  trend_type VARCHAR(20),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE StockPrices (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol VARCHAR(10),
    date DATE,
    open_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    high_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    low_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    close_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE AnalystRecommendations (
    recommendation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol VARCHAR(10),
    analyst_name VARCHAR(100),
    recommendation_date DATE,
    recommendation VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE StockAnalysis (
    analysis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol VARCHAR(10),
    analysis_date DATE,
    trend VARCHAR(50),
    notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE stock_prices (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol VARCHAR(10),
    date DATE,
    open_price DECIMAL,
    close_price DECIMAL,
    high_price DECIMAL,
    low_price DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE stock_symbols (
    symbol_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE stock_trends (
    trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE stock_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_id INT,
    symbol_id INT,
    date DATE,
    analysis_result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE stock_users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50)
)
